body.name: Bfonder Kitchen Knife Set with Wooden Box, 4PCS Professional Chef Knife Set for Bread Garnishing, High Carbon Stainless Steel Japanese Knife Sets with Ultra Sharp Blade & Ergonomic Handle, Gift Box
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 9 mins
features: 【Four-piece Set of the Most Essential Kitchen Knives】Our Bfonder knife set includes: 8″ chef’s knife, 8″ japanese nakiri Knife, 9″ bread knife, 5″ paring knife. Suitable for both home and restaurant use. This professional kitchen knife handles all kitchen tasks, chop like a chef to make your time in the kitchen more enjoyable.

【Non-Slip and Maximize Effort-Saving Handle】The triple-riveted colored wood handle is firmly fixed on the blades to ensure durability and reliability, and will no longer loosen or fall off. The ergonomic handle design minimizes wrist pressure and provides a comfortable grip, even after prolonged use. Your palm and wrist will not feel tired, making it ideal for those who enjoy cooking.

【Long-lasting Sharp Ensures Precision Cutting】A perfect mix of design and practicality. This chef knife set is made of precisely tempered high-carbon stainless steel, possessing great hardness and unparalleled toughness. This knife set can cut meat like slicing through warm butter. The unique irregular hammered pattern on the blade can effectively prevent food from sticking, making cutting smoother.

【Perfect Gifts Set for Family and Friends】 Bfonder kitchen cooking knives come with a protective cover and premium box, making them great birthday gifts for husband, housewarming gifts for new homeowners, and wedding gifts. These knives are both sophisticated and elegant, it will be sure to win their hearts, Your loved ones will be thrilled.

【Unlimited One-Year Warranty】We offer a one-year warranty along with top-of-the-line customer service for our knives. Each knife is backed by superior quality and undergoes strict quality inspections. It is our responsibility to guarantee the quality of our cutting knives. Please feel free to contact us if you have any issues with your knife set.
body.description: Be the fonder of your kitchen! Gift You Awesome Kitchen Time Bfonder knives set celebrates signature cooking style, a blend of the best Japanese and Western techniques. Mater Chef Edition merges the sharpness of authentic, Japanese blade with the comfort and easy care of Western knives. Each blade in this set is made from durable high quality stainless steel to ensure a stain and rust resistant sharp cutting edge every time, these FRIODUR blades are exceptionally corrosion-resistant. The time saved on knife maintenance means more time to spend on cooking. Four-piece Set of the Most Essential Kitchen Knives Long-lasting Sharp Ensures Precision Cutting Non Slip and maximize effort savings handle Unique Gifts to Family and Friends Won't Forget Unlimted One-year Service to Enjoy

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How we built this? In 2008, Clara quit office and became a stay-at-home mom to minimize the harm of divorcing to her daughter. She is good at designing, studied piles of documents about bevel, bolster, material, shape, etc. At the same time, deeply influenced by Reason and Humanism from the US and Buddhism, Taoism from east Asia. After countless repeated honing, the first Bfonder knife was released! We hope you enjoy cooking with love! Be the fonder of your kitchen! Gift You Awesome Kitchen Time Bfonder knives set celebrates signature cooking style, a blend of the best Japanese and Western techniques. Mater Chef Edition merges the sharpness of authentic, Japanese blade with the comfort and easy care of Western knives. Each blade in this set is made from durable high quality stainless steel to ensure a stain and rust resistant sharp cutting edge every time, these FRIODUR blades are exceptionally corrosion-resistant. The time saved on knife maintenance means more time to spend on cooking. Four-piece Set of the Most Essential Kitchen Knives Long-lasting Sharp Ensures Precision Cutting Non Slip and maximize effort savings handle Unique Gifts to Family and Friends Won't Forget Unlimted One-year Service to Enjoy

Chef Knife 8.2 inches Chef Knife. Ideal for cutting large steaks, high-fiber root vegetables. Perfectly balanced with a firm grip and a sharp edge. Japanese Nakiri Knife 8.2 inches Japanese Nakiri Knife. Flat edge and wide rectangular blade, ideal for slicing, dicing and mincing of vegetables. Bread Knife 8.2 inches Bread Knife. With serrated edge, you can cut as cleanly through bread as hard crusts. Paring Knife 5.1 inches Paring Knife.Peeling fruit or vegetables, deveining shrimp, or creating delicate garnishes. Make intricate work easy.

Product Features Guaranteed Quality: Trustworthy quality, certified by FDA (Food and Drug Administration) and LFGB (Lebensmittel- und Futtermittelgesetzbuches). Durable Blade Material: Made of high-quality stainless steel, knife blade is not only sharp and non-sticky, but also has good resistance to corrosion. Specially Designed Handle: With smooth and user-friendly design, you will not lose the grip even your hands are sweaty.

Warm Tips: 1.Keep the knives out of the reach of children. 2.Keep the knives away from fire and heat sources. 3.Avoid patting food with the blade or cutting harder foods (such as fish bones, dried herbs, frozen foods, etc.) to prevent knife blade damage. 4.Do not cut on glass, porcelain or metal surfaces. 5.Do not scratch the blade or test the sharpness of knife with your fingers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love having this knife use to break down meats and chopped vegetables with ease

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023

reviews.reviewerName: Im a full time chef, and bought this on a budget. Was very impressed on sharpness out of the box. Nice weight to it. Bought it mainly to test out the Japanese style handle be ause i have never used one. Expected to just give it away sense im so traditional. Now im in the kitchen telling people not to touch my knife.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Great set. Bought it for my line cooks. They been getting the cuts in on the whole set. Keeps up with the fast pace life in a restaurant setting. Only sharpen once a week and honestly they don't really need it. Just a habit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Rattles when shook
reviews.reviewText: When shaking the knives, they make a rattling sound, proving they aren't properly fastened into the handle. This could prove to be incredibly dangerous in use, there are many good knives in this price range so I wouldn't risk it with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars What I got
reviews.reviewText: Good blades poor handles the only handle that didn't wiggle was the nakiri in the pairing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful knife set!
reviews.reviewText: I loved this set so much they come in a beautiful wood case. The knives are good quality and look very luxurious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: While these knives are really cool-looking, and come in a nice box, mine arrived to me completely unsharpened. I’m not entirely sure how this happened, but yeah, they can’t even chop an onion without applying a significant amount of pressure. Looking at other reviews, this is likely an outlier. I’m going to use a three-stage electric sharpener on them before giving them another try, and may update my review to reflect how they perform in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, well crafted set.
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice, well crafted knife set. It comes well packaged in a presentations box and would make a terrific gift. The knives are wel made and nicely balanced. The blades themselves have a nice pattern on them that helps with slicing sticky things like cheese. I probably won't be using the bread knife anytime soon since I'm watching carbs. The knives are very sharp and make cutting and slicing a lot easier. Elegant and functional - a really nice set!
